text: The La Grande-3 or LG-3 is a hydroelectric dam on the La Grande River in northern Quebec, part of Hydro-Québec's James Bay Project. The station can generate 2,418 MW and was commissioned in 1982–1984. It generates electricity through the reservoir and dam system. The dam and reservoir both are named La Grande-3. == See also == * List of largest power stations in Canada * Reservoirs and dams in Canada == External links == * Hydro-Québec's La Grande Complex * La Grande System * La Grande-3 Category:James Bay Project Category:Dams in Quebec Category:Dams completed in 1984 Category:Dams on the La Grande River
title: La Grande-3 generating station
